name: Slider
description:
`Slider` renders a single component at a time and provides the necessary
functionality to navigate back and forth through swipe gestures (on touch
devices) or mouse clicks (on desktop).

props.name: slides
props.type: { component: typeof SvelteComponentDev; props: Record<string, unknown>; }[]

props.name: prev
props.description: function that determines the previous slide

props.name: next
props.description: function that determines the next slide

props.name: activeIndex
props.description: index of the currently visible slide
